attributes.action: Re-mark the Broomway, a public byway between Wakering Stairs and Foulness Island
attributes.background: The Broomway is a byway open to all traffic across Maplin Sands off the Essex foreshore, linking Wakering Stairs to Foulness Island. The road was once marked with up-ended brooms; these were washed away by the sea some years ago. We respectfully petition that Her Majesty's brooms be replaced.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
